p: Rapid, technically simpler, cheaper alternatives to serological or RNA-based tests have been gaining attention in recent times. Using IgM capture format, an immunochromatographic assay for detecting IgM anti-HEV antibodies have been developed (ASSUREÂ® HEV IgM Rapid Test; MP Biomedical, Singapore) [ 32]. It has a sensitivity of 93% and specificity of 99.7%, established based upon data obtained from a study in Nepal and Indonesia (Genotype1) [ 32]. While, in another study, during a predominant genotype 3 infection in France, the kit showed sensitivity and specificity of 82% and 100% respectively [ 33].
